Name: Name
DropImageHere: Drop image for item here or click to choose an image
MarkedInMapNTimes: Item is marked in the map {{0}} times. No zoom on marker is possible.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheObject: Are you sure you want to delete the item?
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the template?
AreYouSureYouWantToRegenerateTheLanguage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the language keys? This can be useful if the name of the object was changed for example.
DeletingThisTemplateWillAlsoDeleteExport: If you delete this template the associated export template will also be deleted. The item default export template will be used in this case.
ExistingLanguageKeysWillChange: If the language keys are regenerated the existing keys can change. Existing translations might need to be changed.
LockedTemplatePrefix: The template is currently being edited by
LockedObjectPrefix: The item is currently being edited by
